name: METAFESTIVAL
description:
Not a Food Ordering App. JUST PLAY!!

Who doesn't like the atmosphere of a bazaar, where there are lots of food and drinks. MetaFestival is a world bazaar where you can witness the atmosphere of a bazaar in the metaverse world. You can tour the bazaar, visit the food tents, enjoy live music and converse with people around the bazaar. MetaFestival also has AR (Augmented Reality) for those of you who want to project food in MetaFestival into your real world. Let's enjoy your excitement at the MetaFestival bazaar.

LET'S GO TO THE BAZAAR! TOUR THE BAZAAR! WATCH A MUSIC SHOW! 

HAVE FUN!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bukan Aplikasi Pesan Makanan. Mainkan aja!

Siapa sih yang tidak suka suasana bazar, dimana terdapat banyak makanan dan minuman. MetaFestival merupakan dunia bazar yang dimana Kamu dapat menyaksikan suasana bazar di dunia metaverse. Kamu dapat mengelilingi bazar, mengunjungi tenda-tenda makanan, menikmati konser musik dan bercakap-cakap dengan orang di sekitar bazar. MetaFestival juga memiliki AR (Augmented Reality) bagi Kamu yang ingin memproyeksikan makanan di MetaFestival ke dunia nyata Kamu. Ayo nikmati keseruan Kamu di bazar MetaFestival.

AYO KE BAZAR! KELILING BAZAR!  NONTON PERTUNJUKAN MUSIK!

SELAMAT BERSENANG SENANG!

===========================================================

Tim F - SERATIN
